localStorage.name: openmrs:feature-flag-meta:emrapi-module
localStorage.value: {"label":"EMR API Module","description":"This module, if installed, provides core EMR business logic."}

localStorage.name: openmrs:feature-flag-meta:patient-flags
localStorage.value: {"label":"Patient flags","description":"Visual components that enable healthcare providers to see relevant patient information with a glance in the Patient chart. Flags are displayed in the Patient Summary, just below the patient banner, and can link users to other areas of the chart to perform relevant actions during a visit."}

localStorage.name: openmrs:feature-flag-meta:rde
localStorage.value: {"label":"Retrospective Data Entry","description":"Features to enter data for past visits. Includes the 'Edit Past Visit' button in the start visit dialog, and the 'Add Past Visit' button in the patient header"}

localStorage.name: openmrs:feature-flag-meta:enable-embedded-form-view
localStorage.value: {"label":"Enable Embedded Form View","description":"When enabled, encounter summaries will display the full form layout instead of a simple observation list."}

localStorage.name: openmrs:feature-flag-meta:ordertemplates-module
localStorage.value: {"label":"Order Templates","description":"Enable support for order templates when ordering drugs. Requires the backend ordertemplates module."}
